website_summaries.verdict: The perfect combination of cubbies and hooks for optimal classroom storage.
pros: Light finish fits most classroom decor
Ideal for storing bags, coats, books, and more
Available to purchase assembled or unassembled
cons: No pre-drilled holes for wall mounting

customer_reviews.title: Great as a bathroom organizer if you have a lot of kids.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. We use it in our bathroom so that our five kids all have their own bathing, grooming stuff in one place, and a hook for their own towel, and it's worked great for that! The reviews saying the shelves are made of cardboard are wrong. They're made of some sort of thin balsa-like composite. They're not super heavy duty, but they are a rigid, solid material and not cardboard, so won't get soggy if wet (which was a concern of ours).
customer_reviews.author: Henry Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shelf for my daycare. Often I will put things in here that I don't want the children to have direct access to. The reason there are not pre-drilled holes is because you need to find the wall stud to hang it. My hubby had this put together and hung in my daycare in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Sueanne

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: These cubbies are amazing! They have the perfect size and material looks durable. Theu were easy assembly too.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting wood for the dividers but they are wood ...
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting wood for the dividers but they are wood grained cardboard. Could have spent a few more dollars and gotten real wood dividers.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Rider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cubbies
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cubbies. We use them in our daycare. They look professional and are of good quality. Easy to put together. The shipped fast and the price was excellent for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but assembly instructions are not clear and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but assembly instructions are not clear and even though is meant to be hung on the wall, it did not come with any hardware or instructions for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: GLMA

customer_reviews.title: I feel it is made well.
customer_reviews.text: The dividers could have been a bit thicker and it would have been perfect. It's a good product. I believe it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Some screws did not tighten but seems to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Z.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy-duty wall locker. This is exactly what my childcare classroom was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Bogues

customer_reviews.title: easy assemble, only problem is that it is suppose ...
customer_reviews.text: easy assemble, only problem is that it is suppose to be hung on a wall, did not come with any pre drilled holes to be hung on the wall or hanging brackets. left clueless on how to hang it on wall. it took for ever to receive mine since the first one I ordered was lost and the second one that I was to receive was to be delivered next day did not receive till almost 3 weeks later..
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M.

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still looks new
customer_reviews.text: This is top shelf. We installed it ourselves in our mud room and it is holding up and still looks like new. We have had this at least 3 years with lots of kids.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

product_meta.title: Contender 10-Section Wall Mount Coat Locker & Cubby Storage With Shelf, Hanging Wall Organizer With Hooks For Home, Daycare, Classroom In Natural Finish
product_meta.description: GREENGUARD Gold certified. An excellent combination of storage shelves and (5) double coat hooks in a wall mounted unit. Trays sold separately. All surfaces and back are 100% Healthy Kids Plywood with our exclusive Tuff-Gloss UV finish. Assembled and Unassembled options available. 21¾"H x 46¾"W x 12"D.
feature_bullets: SPACE SAVING: Wall hanging locker saves floor space. 5 double-stacked spaces reduces wall space while providing room for storage for up to 10 children.
EASY TO CLEAN & STAIN RESISTANT: This wall mount cubby is coated with Tuff-Gloss UV Finish making it easy to clean and resistant to stains.
SAFE & CERTIFIED: Fully rounded corners & edges for maximum safety. GREENGUARD Gold certified - does not emit any harmful contaminants (VOCs) into atmosphere
DIMENSIONS & DURABILITY: Measures 21.75"H x 46.75"L x 12"W. Made of 100% Baltic Birch Plywood w mortise & hex screw joinery making it sturdy & durable.
ASSEMBLY & CARE: Adult assembly required. Easy to care; wipe clean with mild soap and water solution.
WARRANTY: This wall cubby locker comes with a Manufacturer’s Lifetime Warranty and is Made in the U.S.A.
AMPLE STORAGE: This wall mount locker has 10 cubbies & 10 hooks to organize coats, books, lunch bags & other supplies.Ideal for any room at home, daycare, preschool, playroom, classroom, etc.
